column4: Hi.. I have a builtin webcam in my laptop. 064e:a110 Suyin Corp. It's supported by the Linux UVC drivers which I have installed. The webcam works with Cheese, Skype. But the videorecording in Cheese is speedy. So I wanted to try camorama, but it says: Could not connect to /dev/video0. What should I do?
maybe your camera isn't named /dev/video0 ... see what cheese uses.
do you have another program using it now?
